content: A snail climbs up a 8-meter wall. Each day it climbs 2 meters up, but each night it slides 1 meter down. On which day will it reach the top?
subject: Thinking Skills
explanation: After 6 days: net progress is 1m/day = 6m. On day 7, it climbs 2m more to reach 8m before sliding back.
